sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Action) Once per session, the character may take the Now You See Me action, making a Hard (3 purple d8) Deception check. If successful, a number of NPCs equal to his Cunning within medium range forget any interactions they had with the character during the last thirty minutes.  At the CM's discretion, multiple threats or despairs may give the NPCs in question unpleasant side effects, such as confusion, nightmares, or a persistent and maddening suspicion that they've forgotten something important.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Now you see me</name> <number>TAL0001097</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-22 04:17:26</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c426a0f0db624c542901de90cf96197a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-22 04:19:06</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
